00013 ** Subsystem: Scheduler (SCH) packet macro definitions
00014 **
00015 ** Author: David Kobe
00016 **
00017 ** Notes:
00018 **   These Macro definitions have been put in this file (instead of 
00019 **   sch_msg.h) so this file can be included directly into ASIST build 
00020 **   test scripts. ASIST RDL files can accept C language #defines but 
00021 **   can't handle type definitions. As a result: DO NOT PUT ANY
00022 **   TYPEDEFS OR STRUCTURE DEFINITIONS IN THIS FILE! 
00023 **   ADD THEM TO sch_msg.h IF NEEDED!

00038 #ifndef _sch_msgdefs_
00039 #define _sch_msgdefs_
00040 
00041 /*************************************************************************
00042 **
00043 ** Include section
00044 **
00045 **************************************************************************/
00046 
00047 #include "sch_platform_cfg.h"
00048 
00049 
00050 /*************************************************************************
00051 **
00052 ** SCH application definitions
00053 **
00054 **************************************************************************/
00055 
00056 /*
00057 ** Table value definitions
00058 */
00061 #define SCH_UNUSED              0
00062 #define SCH_ENABLED             1
00063 #define SCH_DISABLED            2
00064 
00066 /*
00067 ** Table Entry Activity Types
00068 */
00071 #define SCH_ACTIVITY_NONE       0
00072 #define SCH_ACTIVITY_SEND_MSG   1
00073 
00075 /*
00076 ** Synchronized to Mission Elapsed Time States
00077 */
00080 #define SCH_NOT_SYNCHRONIZED          0
00081 #define SCH_MINOR_SYNCHRONIZED        1
00082 #define SCH_PENDING_MAJOR_SYNCH       2
00083 #define SCH_MAJOR_SYNCHRONIZED        4
00084 
00086 /*
00087 ** Major Frame Signal Source Identifiers
00088 */
00091 #define SCH_MAJOR_FS_NONE               0
00092 #define SCH_MAJOR_FS_CFE_TIME           1
00093 #define SCH_MAJOR_FS_MINOR_FRAME_TIMER  2
00094 
00096 /*
00097 ** Schedule table group data field masks
00098 */
00101 #define SCH_GROUP_NUMBER_BIT_MASK  0xFF000000
00102 #define SCH_MULTI_GROUP_BIT_MASK   0x00FFFFFF
00103 
00105 /*
00106 ** Message table definitions
00107 */
00110 #define SCH_MIN_MSG_WORDS       (CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE / 2)
00111 #define SCH_TABLE_ENTRIES       (SCH_TOTAL_SLOTS * SCH_ENTRIES_PER_SLOT)
00112 
00114 #define SCH_NUM_STATUS_BYTES_REQD    (((SCH_TABLE_ENTRIES+7)/8)*2)
00115 
00118 /*
00119 **  SCH command packet command codes 
00120 ** (SCH_GND_CMD_MID and SCH_SC_CMD_MID)
00121 */
00156 #define SCH_NOOP_CC             0   /* no-op command */
00157 
00205 #define SCH_RESET_CC            1   /* Reset HK counters */
00206 
00241 #define SCH_ENABLE_CC           2   /* Enable Schedule Table Entry */
00242 
00277 #define SCH_DISABLE_CC          3   /* disable schedule table entry */
00278 
00313 #define SCH_ENABLE_GROUP_CC     4   /* enable group of entries */
00314 
00349 #define SCH_DISABLE_GROUP_CC    5   /* disable group of entries */
00350 
00383 #define SCH_ENABLE_SYNC_CC      6   /* enable major frame synchronization */
00384 
00415 #define SCH_SEND_DIAG_TLM_CC    7   /* sends diagnostic message packet */
00416 
00419 #endif /* _sch_msgdefs_ */
